short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: auxiliary tool for searching pardot audit page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool to search pardot audit pages

Feature:

When user visits pi.pardot.com/visitorAudit/index/prospect_id/*
    The extension will inject the search section to the top of the page


When user visits */lightning/page/pardot/prospect?pardot__path=%2FvisitorAudit%2Findex%2Fprospect_id%2F and click the icon.
    The extension will pop up a search page. 
     And the page will display the first page of audit when successfully launched.


Additional Note: 
        * lightning version only works for prod environment. (If the embedded frame comes from embedded.demo.pardot.force.com. The extension won't work.)
       * for lightning version search page, the link from audit page fields(if any) won't work due to CORS restriction.

Release note:
2024-07-08: enhancement - better launch/search experience
2023-07-03: bugfix - incorrect ending status when not searching from first page
2023-06-27 : enhancement - export search result to CSV
